com.yahoo.bullet.dsl.converter

Class BulletRecordConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.bullet.dsl.converter.BulletRecordConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroBulletRecordConverter, MapBulletRecordConverter, POJOBulletRecordConverter

    public abstract class BulletRecordConverter
extends Object
implements Serializable
    BulletRecordConverter is used to convert objects into BulletRecords. Converters should extend this class and expect configuration though BulletDSLConfig. If a BulletRecordSchema is provided, and type-checking is enabled, the converter will check that values match their types in the schema and throw if they do not. If a schema is not provided, the level of type-checking is left to the implementation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • build

        protected BulletRecordConverter build()
                               throws BulletDSLException
        Helper function used to initialize BulletRecordConverter from BulletDSLConfig. The default implementation sets the BulletRecordProvider, and optionally the BulletRecordSchema, used by the converter.
        Returns:
        This initialized BulletRecordConverter.
        Throws:
        BulletDSLException - if there is an error creating the converter.

      • convert

        public com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord convert(Object object)
                                             throws BulletDSLException
        Converts an object to a BulletRecord using the configuration-defined implementation of BulletRecord.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to be converted.
        Returns:
        A BulletRecord with fields from object.
        Throws:
        BulletDSLException - if there is an error converting the object to a BulletRecord.

      • convert

        public com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord convert(Object object,
                                                    com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord record)
                                             throws BulletDSLException
        Converts an object to a BulletRecord using the given record. The default implementation assumes a valid schema.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to be converted.
        record - The record to insert fields into.
        Returns:
        The record with additional fields from object.
        Throws:
        BulletDSLException - if there is an error converting the object to a BulletRecord.

      • getTypedObject

        protected com.yahoo.bullet.typesystem.TypedObject getTypedObject(String name,
                                                                 com.yahoo.bullet.typesystem.Type type,
                                                                 Serializable value)
        Converts the field value with the given name and expected type into a TypedObject. If type checking is enabled, it will check to make sure that the expected type matches the final type in the TypedObject. This method is only used for non-record fields.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the field.
        type - The expected type of the field.
        value - The Serializable value of the field.
        Returns:
        A TypedObject wrapping the value.

      • from

        public static BulletRecordConverter from(BulletDSLConfig config)
        Creates a BulletRecordConverter instance using the specified class.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration containing the BulletRecordConverter class name and other relevant settings.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the specified BulletRecordConverter class.
